newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA-DIRBTINIES NEEDS 20 MLN LITAS INVESTMENT.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA-DIRBTINIES NEEDS 20 MLN LITAS INVESTMENT.

text.p: Lithuanian textile firm million litas of investment this year and would maybe make another share issue.

"To upgrade its production lines the company would need investment of around 20 million litas in 1997 and we are also considering another share issue this year," company official Benjamina Jakavichiene told Reuters.
The present share capital of the company is 48 million litas but the company decided to boost it to 96 million litas from its own resources in December 1996.
Only the formalities with the securities commission remain for it to be registered in the near future, Jakavichiene added.
Dirbtinis is based in Lithuania's second city of Kaunas. The state runs 16 percent of the company and the rest stake is held by private investors.
